DEFINITIONS IMPLICIT TAGS ::=
BEGIN
contents.ja: 始める

contents.text: -- EXPORTS ALL --
contents.ja: - すべてエクスポート -

contents.text:
IMPORTS
  Extensions, AlgorithmIdentifier
  FROM PKIX1Explicit88 {iso(1) identified-organization(3)
  dod(6) internet(1) security(5) mechanisms(5) pkix(7)
  id-mod(0) id-pkix1-explicit-88(1)}

GeneralName, PolicyInformation
FROM PKIX1Implicit88 {iso(1) identified-organization(3)
dod(6) internet(1) security(5) mechanisms(5) pkix(7)
id-mod(0) id-pkix1-implicit-88(2)}

PKIStatusInfo, PKIStatusField FROM PKIXCMP {iso(1)
identified-organization(3) dod(6) internet(1) security(5)
mechanisms(5) pkix(7) id-mod(0)
id-mod-cmp(9)}

CertId, OCSPResponse, CertStatus
FROM OCSP
{iso(1) identified-organization(3)
dod(6) internet(1) security(5) mechanisms(5) pkix(7) id-mod(0)
id-mod-ocsp(14)}
-- Authority Information Access for DVCS
contents.ja: -  DVCの権限情報アクセス

contents.text: id-ad-dvcs  OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= {id-pkix id-ad(48) 4}
-- Key Purpose for DVCS
contents.ja: -  DVCの重要な目的

contents.text: id-kp-dvcs  OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= {id-pkix id-kp(3) 10}
-- eContentType for a dvcs requests and responses
contents.ja: -DVCSリクエストと応答のecontentType

contents.text:
id-ct-DVCSRequestData  OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { id-smime ct(1) 7 }
id-ct-DVCSResponseData OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { id-smime ct(1) 8 }
-- Data validation certificate attribute
contents.ja: - データ検証証明書属性

contents.text: id-aa-dvcs-dvc OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { id-smime aa(2) 29 }
-- using the following bases :
contents.ja: - 次のベースを使用してください。

contents.text:
id-smime    OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { iso(1) member-body(2)
               us(840) rsadsi(113549) pkcs(1) pkcs-9(9) 16 }
Version ::= Integer
Nonce ::= Integer

CertEtcToken ::= CHOICE {
     certificate                  [0] IMPLICIT Certificate ,
     esscertid                    [1] ESSCertId ,
     pkistatus                    [2] IMPLICIT PKIStatusInfo ,
     assertion                    [3] ContentInfo ,
     crl                          [4] IMPLICIT CertificateList,
     ocspcertstatus               [5] IMPLICIT CertStatus,
     oscpcertid                   [6] IMPLICIT CertId ,
     oscpresponse                 [7] IMPLICIT OCSPResponse,
     capabilities                 [8] SMIMECapabilities,
     extension                    Extension
}

DVCSRequestInformation ::= SEQUENCE  {
        version                      INTEGER DEFAULT 1 ,
        service                      ServiceType,
        nonce                        Nonce OPTIONAL,
        requestTime                  DVCSTime OPTIONAL,
        requester                    [0] GeneralNames OPTIONAL,
        requestPolicy                [1] PolicyInformation OPTIONAL,
        dvcs                         [2] GeneralNames OPTIONAL,
        dataLocations                [3] GeneralNames OPTIONAL,
        extensions                   [4] IMPLICIT Extensions OPTIONAL
}

DVCSCertInfo::= SEQUENCE  {
         version             Integer DEFAULT 1 ,
         dvReqInfo           DVCSRequestInformation,
         messageImprint      DigestInfo,
         serialNumber        Integer,
         responseTime        DVCSTime,
         dvStatus            [0] PKIStatusInfo OPTIONAL,
         policy              [1] PolicyInformation OPTIONAL,
         reqSignature        [2] SignerInfos  OPTIONAL,
         certs               [3] SEQUENCE SIZE (1..MAX) OF
                                 TargetEtcChain OPTIONAL,
         extensions          Extensions OPTIONAL
}
END
contents.ja: 終わり

contents.text: Appendix F - Examples
contents.ja: 付録F-例

contents.text: This chapter contains an example of a request and a response of a 'Certify Claim of Possession of Data' transaction of the Clepsydre Demonstration Project sponsored by La Poste, France.
contents.ja: この章には、要求の例と、フランスのLa Posteが後援するClepsydreデモンストレーションプロジェクトの取引の「データの所有権の認定請求」の回答が含まれています。

contents.text: The information has been formatted with a slightly modified version of Peter Gutmann's dumpasn1 program.
contents.ja: 情報は、Peter GutmannのDumpasn1プログラムのわずかに変更されたバージョンでフォーマットされています。

contents.text: The response Data Validation Certificate contains the signing certificate.
contents.ja: 応答データ検証証明書には、署名証明書が含まれています。
